title: Alarm
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a tiny bell and a piece of fine silver wire)

text | Choose a door, window, or an area within range that is no larger than a 20-foot cube. Until the spell ends, an alarm alerts you whenever a Tiny or larger creature touches or enters the warded area. You can designate creatures to not trigger the alarm.
text | A mental alarm alerts you if you are within 1 mile and wakes you if sleeping.
text | An audible alarm produces a bell sound for 10 seconds within 60 feet

title: Animal Friendship
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a morsel of food)
text | A beast within range that can see and hear you must make a Wisdom save or be charmed for the duration. Harm from you or your allies ends the effect.
text | When you case this spell using a slot of 2nd level or higher, you can affect one additional beast for every slot level above 1st.

title: Animal Messenger
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a morsel of food)

text | Designate a Tiny creature within range that you can see. That creature travels up to 50 miles per day flying (25 by land) and delivers a message to a person fitting a general description given by you. The message can be up to 25 words and is delivered in your voice.
text | If you cast the spell with a spell slot above 2nd, the duration of the spell increases by 48 hours for each slot level above 2nd.

title: Barkskin
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a handful of oak bark)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | Touched creature's AC cannot be less than 16 for the duration and takes on a rough, bark-like appearance.

title: Beast Sense
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | You touch a willing beast and for the duration you see what the beast sees and hear what it hears.

title: Bless
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a sprinkling of holy water)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | Up to three creatures within range can choose to add 1d4 to any attack roll made during the duration.
text | You can target one additional creature for every slot level above 1st used to cast this spell.

title: Command
contents: text | The target must pass a Wisdom saving throw or else follow a one-word command issued by you on its next turn. Commands can be: Approach; Drop; Flee; Grovel; Halt; or other one-word commands.
text | You can affect one additional creature within 30 feet of the initial target for each slot level above 1st used to cast this spell.

title: Commune with Nature
contents: text | This spell grants you knowledge of up to to three facts about the surrounding 3 miles if outdoors, or 300 feet if underground. You choose three from: terrain and bodies of water; prevalent plants, minerals, animals or peoples; powerful celestials, fey, fiends, elementals or undead; influence from other planes; or buildings.

title: Conjure Animals
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | Fey spirits appear and take the form of: 1 beast of CR2 or lower; 2 beasts of CR1 or lower; 4 beasts of CR1/2 or lower; or 8 beasts of CR1/4 of lower.
text | The summoned creatures are friendly toward you and will obey your commands.
text | You summon twice as many creatures if a 5th-level slot is used, three times as many with a 7th-level slot, and four times as many with a 9th-level slot.

title: Conjure Barrage
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (one piece of ammunition or a thrown weapon)

text | You throw a weapon or shoot a piece of ammunition into the air to create a 60-foot cone of identical weapons that shoot forward, dealing 3d8 damage of the same type of the weapon or ammunition used. Creatures hit may make a Dexterity saving throw to take half damage.

title: Conjure Volley
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (one piece of ammunition or one thrown weapon)

text | You throw or fire one weapon or piece of ammunition into the air and choose a spot within the spell's range. The weapon transforms into hundreds of duplicates that rain down in a 40-foot radius centered on the point you choose. Creatures in the area take 8d8 damage, but can make a Dexterity saving throw for half damage.

title: Conjure Woodland Beings
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (one holly berry per creature summoned)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour

text | You summon fey creatures that appear in one of the following forms: 1 fey of CR2 or lower; 2 fey of CR1 or lower; 4 fey of CR1/2 or lower; or 8 fey of CR1/4 or lower. The summoned creature(s) are friendly toward you and follow your commands.
text | When a 6th-level slot is used for this spell, double the number of fey summoned. If an 8th-level slot is used, triple it.

title: Cordon of Arrows
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (four or more arrows or bolts)

text | You stick four pieces of ammunition in the ground near you when you cast the spell. Whenever a creature other than you comes within 30 feet of you one piece of ammunition flies at it and attacks. That creature must make a Dexterity save or take 1d6 piercing damage.
text | The amount of ammunition increases by 2 for each slot level above 2nd used to cast this spell.

title: Cure Wounds
contents: text | A creature you touch is healed a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This has no effect on undead or constructs.
text | The hit points healed increase by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st used to cast this spell.

title: Darkvision
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (either a pinch of dried carrot or an agate)
text | Touched creature gains Darkvision out to 60 feet for the duration.

title: Daylight
contents: text | Bright light emanates from a point or object you designate within range for the duration. Covering the source of the light suppresses the effect.

title: Detect Magic
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes
text | For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you. If you sense magic this way, you can use your action to see a faint aura and determine the school of magic, if any.

title: Detect Poison & Disease
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a yew leaf)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes
text | For the duration, you can sense the presence, location, and type of poison, disease, and poisonous creatures within 30 feet of you.

title: Ensnaring Strike
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A writhing mass of thorny vines appear when you next strike with a weapon. The target must make a Strength saving throw or is restrained by the vines for the duration. While restrained, the target takes 1d6 piercing damage at the start of its turn. A restrained creature can spend an action to attempt a Strength check to break free of the vines.
text | The vines deal an additional 1d6 damage per round for each slot level above 1st used to cast this spell.

title: Find Traps
contents: text | This spell reveals the presence of traps within range of the spell, but not their location.

title: Fog Cloud
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | You create a 20-foot radius cloud of fog centered on a point you designate within range. It lasts for the duration or until a moderate wind disperses it.
text | The radius of the cloud is extended by 20 feet for each slot level above first used to cast this spell.

title: Freedom of Movement
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a leather strap, bound around the arm or similar appendage)

text | A willing creature touched, for the duration, is unhampered by difficult terrain, cannot be restrained or paralyzed, can spend 5 feet of movement to escape nonmagical restraints, and has no movement penalty for being underwater.

title: Goodberry
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a sprig of mistletoe)

text | Up to ten magic-infused berries appear in your hand. Eating a berry restores 1 Hit Point and provide 24 hours worth of nourishment. The berries lose their potency if they have not been consumed within 24 hours.

title: Grasping Vine
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A vine sprouts from the ground in any space within range. The vine grabs at a creature up to 30 feet away from it that you can see. That creature must make a Dexterity saving throw or be pulled 20 feet toward the vine. Until the spell ends, the vine can lash out at the same creature or another one as a bonus action on your turn.

title: Hail of Thorns
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | When next you make a ranged attack against a creature before the spell ends, thorns sprout from the weapon. The target of the attack and each creature within 10 take 1d10 piercing damage, Dexterity save for half damage.
text | The damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 1st used to cast this spell, to a maximum of 6d10.

title: Hunter's Mark
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour

text | You choose a creature you can see within range. For the duration, you deal 1d6 extra damage to that creature with weapon attacks and you have advantage on Survival and Perception checks to locate it. If the target is dropped to 0 HP before the spell ends, you can designate a new target as a bonus action.
text | The duration increases to 8 hours if a 3rd or 4th level slot is used, and 24 hours for a 5th or higher.

title: Jump
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a grasshopper's hind leg)
text | Touched creature's jump distance is tripled for the duration.

title: Lesser Restoration
contents: text | You touch a creature and end one disease or condition (blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned) affecting it.

title: Lightning Arrow
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | The weapon (if thrown) or piece of ammunition of your next ranged attack becomes a bolt of lightning. Make the attack roll as normal, but the target takes 4d8 lightning damage on a hit, half on a miss, instead of the weapon's normal damage. Whether you hit or not, all creatures within 10 feet of the target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failure they take 2d8 lightning damage, half with a success.
text | The damage for both effects increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 3rd used to cast this spell.

title: Locate Animals/Plants
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a bit of fur from a bloodhound)
text | Concentrating on the name of a specific kind of beast or plant, you learn the location and distance to the closest one matching your description within 5 miles, if any.

title: Locate Creature
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a bit of fur from a bloodhound)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | Describe or name a creature that is familiar to you, You sense the direction to the creature's location if that creature is within 1,000 feet of you.

title: Locate Object
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a forked twig)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes
text | Describe or name an object that is familiar to you. If that object is within 1,000 feet of you then you know the direction and distance to it.

title: Longstrider
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pinch of dirt)
text | Touched creature's speed increases by 10 feet for the duration.
text | You can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st used to cast this spell.

title: Nondetection
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pinch of diamond dust worth 25 gp)

text | For the duration the creature you touch cannot be targeted by divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors. This effect can also be placed over an area or object no larger than 10 feet in any dimension.

title: Pass Without Trace
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (ashes from a burned leaf of mistletoe and a sprig of spruce)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | For the duration, creatures you choose within 30 feet get a +10 bonus on Stealth checks and cannot be tracked by nonmagical means.

title: Plant Growth
contents: property | Casting time | 1 action or 8 hours

text | If cast as an action, choose a spot within range that you can see. All plant life within 100 feet of that spot becomes thick and overgrown and creatures must spend 4 feet of movement to move 1 foot.
text | If cast as 8 hours, you enrich the land within half a mile. The plants within range become enriched for 1 year, yielding twice the normal amount of food when harvested.

title: Protection from Energy
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | For the duration, one creature you touch has resistance to one damage type of your choice from: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder.

title: Protection from Poison
contents: text | Touched creature is cured of one type of poison. For the duration, the creature has advantage on saving throws against being poisoned and has resistance to poison damage.

title: Silence
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | For the duration, no sound can enter or pass trough a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point you designate within range. Any creature or object entirely inside the sphere is immune to thunder damage, and are deafened while inside. Spells that require verbal components are impossible in the sphere.

title: Speak with Animals
contents: text | You gain the ability to speak and understand beasts for the duration.

title: Speak with Plants
contents: text | You grant plants within 30 feet of you sentience and the ability to communicate with you.

title: Spike Growth
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (seven sharp thorns)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes
text | A 20-foot radius area of ground is covered with spikes and thorns. Creatures within the area and entering it take 2d4 piercing damage for every 5 feet they travel through the area.
text | The area is camouflaged to look natural. Creatures must make a Perception check to notice the thorns before entering/avoiding the area.

title: Stoneskin
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (diamond dust worth 100 gp)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | The spell turns the flesh of a willing creature you touch as hard as stone. For the duration, the creature has resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage.

title: Swift Quiver
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a quiver containing at least one piece of ammo)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | You transmute your quiver so that it supplies an endless supply of ammunition for the duration. On each of your turns you can use a bonus action to make two attacks with a weapon that uses ammunition from the quiver. Each time you fire, the quiver magically replaces the ammunition back in the quiver.

title: Tree Stride
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | You gain the ability to enter a tree and move inside it to inside another tree of the same type within 500 feet. You can use this mode of transportation once per round for the duration, and must end each round outside of a tree.

title: Water Breathing
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a short reed or piece of straw)
text | This spell grants you and up to ten creatures within range the ability to breath underwater until the spell ends. All affected creatures also retain their natural mode of respiration.

title: Water Walk
contents: property | Components | V, S, M ( a piece of cork)

text | This spell grants up to 10 creatures within range the ability to walk on water, acid, mud, snow, quicksand, or lava as if it were a solid surface, though those walking on lava still take damage from the heat. If an affected creature is submerged, they float toward the surface at a pace of 60 feet per round.

title: Wind Wall
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a tiny fan and a feather)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A wall of wind 50 feet long and 15 feet tall appears within range. Creatures in the wall's path when it appears take 3d8 bludgeoning damage, halved with a Dexterity saving throw. The wind wall keeps small or smaller flying creatures and ordinary projectiles away.
